items.value: @createArray('select * from [SalesLT].[Product] where productID > 100;','select * from [SalesLT].[Customer] where customerID > 100 and customerID < 1000;')

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(HW_dt) as HW_dt from [SalesLT].[HighWater] where id=1;

activities.name: Lookup for modified date from SQL DB

dependsOn.activity: Lookup for modified date from SQL DB

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from [SalesLT].[Customer] where modifiedDate > '@{activity('Lookup from HW table').output.firstRow.HW_dt}'
 and modifiedDate <= '@{activity('Lookup for modified date from SQL DB').output.firstRow.mx_dt}';

text.value: update [SalesLT].[HighWater] set HW_dt='@{activity('Lookup for modified date from SQL DB').output.firstRow.mx_dt}' where id=1;

activities.name: Fetch Last Modified date from SQL DB

dependsOn.activity: Fetch Last Modified date from SQL DB

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from [SalesLT].[Customer] where modifiedDate > '@{activity('Fetch HW DateTime').output.firstRow.HW_dt}'
and modifiedDate <= '@{activity('Fetch Last Modified date from SQL DB').output.firstRow.mx_dt}';
select '@{activity('Fetch Last Modified date from SQL DB').output.firstRow.mx_dt}' as HW_dt;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select * from [SalesLT].[Customer] c join [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] cs
on c.customerID=cs.customerID;
